availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Cowan (Pendleton County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer.)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, cooper and farmer. Native of Ireland. Married to Eliza Dean Cowan in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on May 2, 1845. Married to Mary Flaherty Cowan in Hamilton County, Ohio, on September 28, 1855. Father of Isabell Cowan, John T. Cowan, and Margaret A. Cowan. Cooper in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 386A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, City/District, p. 649.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994052, Pendleton County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272806.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #000344469, p. 14.
